## Development 

### Prerequisites

Use [asdf]() to install all the tools necessary.

It's preferable to keep language, JRE and CLI tools versions locked.

Golang is preferable to build asdf and other golang CLI tools from sources.

We're using 

 - Rust for FFI bindings
 - Java 25 LTS 
 - Node.js 
 - [Gradle 9]()
 - [Helm 3]()
 - Latest [trivy](https://github.com/aquasecurity/trivy) 
 - Latest [syft](https://github.com/anchore/syft)
 - Latest [grype](https://github.com/anchore/grype)
